text: Douliu zai houfang de renmen, dang nimen wei huoqu zhanlipin er chufa de shihou, tamen jiang shuo:“Rang women gen nimen qu ba!” Tamen yu biangeng zhenzhu de pan ci. Ni shuo:“Nimen juedui bude gen women qu, yiqian, zhenzhu yi zheyang shuoguole.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Buran, nimen jidu women.” Buran, tamen bu shen liaojie
